name: Beneath the Branches - Demo
description:
Seek the heart of the forest, seek the King beneath the branches.
Stories tell of an ancient forest, home to fairys and magic, and deep in it's heart they say the Fairy King waits to grant the wish of anyone brave enough to find him. 

Brave the forbidden forest, seek out the King beneath the branches and uncover horrifying truths beyond understanding. 

Beneath the Branches is somewhere between a fairytale and a cosmic horror. 

Game Design by Ben Leggett.
